reviews.review_msg:
Seems: 
*Doesn't care for his students and lectures to himself

In fact:
Cares for input - insofar as it stimulates his knowledge in the "field".

*There's a stark difference between knowing/understanding your subject (material) and teaching it.*

Especially for Mr. HAHN, The former has been too much of a pleasure that it might be recommended the efforts thereof be (very much) invested in the latter  :)
he is openly dogmatic and confrontational if you see him in office hours
